titleStmt.title: The general inefficacy and insincerity of a late or death-bed repentance with earnestest disswasives from committing our eternal condition, to that infinite hazard, and a full resolution of the case, how far a death-bed repentance is possible, to be sincere and effectual.
titleStmt.author: Beverley, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Redmayne, for W. Grantham ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Thomas Beverley. cf. BM.
